title: Innovating Indian Engineering Education through Large-Scale Industry-Linked Problem-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Engineering Knowledge and Fundamental Understanding of Industrial Processes
context.additional_context: Students experience real-world industrial problems via VR simulations in a BYOD environment and validate competencies through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can draft problem definitions that reflect industry requirements.
Learners can solve real-world industrial problems using VR simulations.
Learners can improve solutions by applying a feedback system modeled after the FAIR Committee.
Learners can complete industry-linked capstone project proposals based on their digital tool proficiency.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
